CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Natural Gas?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Natural Gas is arc {Oil}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Solar?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Solar is arc {Oil}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Natural Gas} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Natural Gas to Geothermal in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Geothermal to Natural Gas in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Solar and Natural Gas in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Solar and Natural Gas is {89}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Oil and Geothermal in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Oil and Geothermal is {179}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Solar?
SC.A: The total flow output from Solar is {214}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Solar?
SC.A: The total flow input by Solar is {251}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 201? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {237} from {Geothermal} to {Natural Gas}, a flow of {204} from {Natural Gas} to {Geothermal}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 99? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {89} from {Natural Gas} to {Solar}, a flow of {68} from {Solar} to {Natural Gas}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 134 and 154? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {146} from {Solar} to {Oil}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Solar to Natural Gas or from Natural Gas to Oil?
NC.A: The flow from {Natural Gas} to {Oil} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Oil to Geothermal, from Solar to Oil, or from Solar to Natural Gas?
NC.A: The flow from {Oil} to {Geothermal} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Geothermal}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Geothermal} and {Natural Gas}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Oil, Arc Geothermal, Arc Natural Gas, Arc Solar}.
